mapper.select: select hi.id, hi.hotel_id, ci.city_name, si.scenery_name, hi.hotel_name, hi.hotel_pic, hi.hotel_price, hi.hotel_desc, hi.create_time, hi.modified_time from hotel_info hi left join scenery_info si on hi.scenery_id = si.scenery_id left join city_info ci on si.city_id = ci.city_id

select hi.id, hi.hotel_id, ci.city_name, si.scenery_name, hi.hotel_name, hi.hotel_pic, hi.hotel_price, hi.hotel_desc, hi.create_time, hi.modified_time from hotel_info hi left join scenery_info si on hi.scenery_id = si.scenery_id left join city_info ci on si.city_id = ci.city_id where hi.hotel_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into hotel_info (hotel_id, scenery_id, hotel_name, hotel_price, hotel_pic, hotel_desc) values (#{hotelId}, #{sceneryId}, #{hotelName}, #{hotelPrice}, #{hotelPic}, #{hotelDesc})
mapper.select: select scenery_name from scenery_info si where si.city_id = (select city_id from city_info ci where city_name = #{cityName})
select scenery_id from scenery_info where scenery_name = #{sceneryName}
